overview: Sundar Subramanian is co-founder and Director of Business Development of Dimdim, Inc. He worked on web services at CA; on peta-byte networking at AT&T submarine systems (later Tycom); and on atomic energy reactors. He holds an MS in Computer Science from Drexel University and a BS in Electronics Engineering from Bombay University. He is currently trying to restrict his internet usage to “only 20 hours/day”

relationships.title: Co-Founder and Director of Business Development
